title: The best online shopping Yet!
text: I love this app in so many different ways, but the most interesting way is the fact that I can track my order to Exactly the place it should be. It arrives on time, and with my personal experience, it hasn‚Äôt been delivered late , or in bad condition not once. And another thing about the shipping, i love how it would tell you if your order will be delayed or not, because in most apps I have experienced, they never tell you this much information about when your item is going to arrive. So I‚Äôm that case , I highly recommend SHEIN if you want to know where your order is at all times.
